name: The Three Stooges: Treasure Hunt Hijinks
name_original: The Three Stooges: Treasure Hunt Hijinks
description:
The Three Stooges: Treasure Hunt Hijinks is a game developed by TechFront. It came out on 01-06-2008. eGames published the game.
The Three Stooges: Treasure Hunt Hijinks is available on PC.
